question: 弔意
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: Express your unique <kanji>idea</kanji> of <kanji>condolence</kanji> by offering your <vocabulary>condolence</vocabulary>s and <vocabulary>sympathy</vocabulary> to people who are going through hard times.
